review: I already owned a Chromecast but have Amazon Prime, which does not play nicely with Chromecast. I ordered the Fire Stick to take advantage of this membership benefit.  All I can say is CUMBERSOME ! Rather than conveniently casting from ones device one must keep track of a miniature remote.  I found this annoying as I had to strain to see the screen to select letters on the keyboard.  My eyes are good but the interface is very small.  Never mind the chance of misplacing the teeny remote.  It also drives, drives, DRIVES everything to Amazon ! It doesn't flow freely to one app to the next.  I was very disappointed and returned it.  Go with Chromecast. It's easy to use and a pleasure.

review: One of the first to own the Fire TV Stick w remote and although I'm a huge fan of Amazon I was disappointed by this item.  The remote just isn't designed very well and it loses signal/shuts down more often than my ROKU.  Remote design just doesn't make sense to me---u do not place the home button so close or in the middle of the most used functions.  Look at ROKU, the home button is far away from the play, rewind, forward.  Most remotes are designed this way and in Fire TV remote hitting the home button takes you completely out of the program or app you watching.  Very annoying.
